text: Counter Action (Противостояние) is a series of Russian tactical video games developed by Russian studio Nashi Igryhttps://www.mobygames.com/game/counter- action published by Doka. The first game was released for DOS in 1997. The game's interface is "traditional and simple". Yandex felt that despite its shortcomings, it should command respect due to being a local Russian game than made a significant splash onto the local market and had some buzz internationally too. == References == == External links == * http://download.abandonware.org/magazines/Joystick/joystick_numero084/Joystick%20084%20-%20Page%20123%20(juillet%20-%20ao%FBt%201997).jpg Category:1997 video games Category:DOS games Category:DOS-only games Category:Real-time strategy video games Category:Video games developed in Russia Category:World War II video games
title: Counter Action
